Reviews.Title: No issue
Reviews.Author: Martin Mcfly
Reviews.Content: So far so good, I have a 2800 sqf house and it reads full reception everywhere in it, the picture is crystal clear and the sound is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfully designed
Reviews.Author: Amelia Gaynor
Reviews.Content: For the last 3 months this product has helped us so much. The connection has never dropped on us giving us confidence relying on this monitor. The movement of the camera is smooth and very easy to use. The range of motion is larger than I thought so we can pan back and forth from the door to the crib to see what's going on. The extra features like the lens is worth the extra money.

Reviews.Title: Like it, don't love it.
Reviews.Author: mcmcph
Reviews.Content: The view is great, the only thing I don't like is that there is no "sleep" mode to turn off the background static when the room is mostly quiet.

Reviews.Title: Great baby monitor
Reviews.Author: katie mcdonald
Reviews.Content: We bought this monitor and couldn't be happier!  It has great features.  You can see the temperature, control volume & brightness, talk through to your child in their room, scan between both kids room (if you have two camera's) and move the camera head around the room.The screen is big and clear and you can zoom in and zoom out.  I can tell when my daughter's eye are open or closed.The customer service is the best which is a very nice feature to have!I highly recommend this video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Customer service sent me a free wide-angle lens. Seriously.
Reviews.Author: bpositive
Reviews.Content: Baby hasn't arrived quite yet, so I haven't used this unit all that much. I did set it up on the wall above his crib and tested it out with my wife. The picture is very clear, the tilt and pan function is smooth, the sound and two-way talk are both clear. No issues with the signal. No complaints at all.Mae from Infant Optics contacted me out of the blue a few weeks ago to check in and see if the monitor was working as expected. I wrote back to say that all seemed to be good. She wrote back shortly after that and stated that Infant Optics was making a push to get customers to sign up for the warranty that comes with the unit. Since I had already signed up for the warranty, Mae said she wanted to send me a free wide-angle lens as a thank you. I sent her my shipping information and several days later, I received the lens in my mailbox. I did not pay a cent for this-- not even for shipping. In a world where "free" almost always comes with a hidden cost, I greatly appreciated this gesture.The quality of this baby monitor seems great (from my limited use so far), and the customer service is definitely great. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent baby monitor.
Reviews.Author: Keith Rice
Reviews.Content: Excellent product with the best customer service I have ever experienced with any product. Purchased this after reading and researching lots of reviews of monitors and our only regret is not purchasing it earlier. Our daughter is 21 months now and after purchasing the monitor/camera package, we purchased a second camera and wide angle lens to go in her playroom. Signal of unit and features are great, has great clarity and resolution in the nightvision mode is great. The customer service offered by Infant Optics is second to none.  Buy with confidence!

Reviews.Title: 5 stars thanks to customer service
Reviews.Author: P. Cheng
Reviews.Content: I would have given it a 4 due to issues others have mentioned in their reviews.  But when the mircoUSB charger wasn't working anymore, I contact the company directly and they took care of it real quick.  First the company has hours 7 days a week and that was super handy.  The Monitor stopped working a Friday, I spoke with them on Saturday, they shipped out a replacement on Monday and I got it Thursday.  Less than one week total.  Not too bad, I dont think.  They communicated well throughout!Another point, they said,and our replace did have some changes.  One related to the mircoUSB, the problem we had, and the other is removing the loud beeps to turn the screen on and off.  We definitely like the new monitor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Baby Monitor with equally amazing Support
Reviews.Author: Gandhi Thirugnanam
Reviews.Content: We choose this monitor after seeing all the great reviews, and it is money well spent.  We bought the monitor and the additional lens.  It was quite easy to setup.  We can see the baby day and night with no problems.  The volume works well, but there is some feedback when the volume on the monitor is up and you are next to the camera.  I assume that this is expected.  The Menu is easy to use.On a Friday, We did run into a problem the monitor stopped charging (something snapped inside the monitor).  Mae in Customer Service was amazing.  She quickly realized that we needed a replacement monitor.  As soon as I finished talking with her, i send back the broken monitor and emailed a copy of the UPS receipt for the monitor I sent back and the same day a new monitor was ordered for us us, which we received  by Tuesday.The new monitor we received no longer has that annoying beep that you see in many reviews.  They also reinforced the plug area which broke  on our unit.We have been using for a month and no other complaints.  We are planning on buying one more camera.The only drawback I can think of is that we cannot have two monitors for a single camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera that moves and zooms in/out
Reviews.Author: Stephen Epple
Reviews.Content: This is the best baby monitor I've seen. Really love it. You can adjust the direction of the camera and the zoom depth using the lens. Really useful when you can't see clearly at night (use the zoom lens plus digital zoom).  Outstanding video and sound quality!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Video Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Courtney McAlpine
Reviews.Content: Has all the features we wanted: night vision, PTZ, talk-back, wireless (not wifi). Has some interference from the microwave when we run that, but otherwise the distance works great.The new firmware is a must: it doesn't beep during turning on or off anymore or when it "sleeps".We love this unit and use it constantly. We're looking forward to adding more cameras as our family expands in the futureThe best part about infant optics is Mae and their customer support!!The only thing I would change with this product is adding the option for smart audio (where it turns off the sound until a preset level is reached) - we use a sound machine so we hear that all the time.I would definitely recommend this product to friends.

Reviews.Title: Probably the best monitor system available and at a reasonable price too
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as described. Virtual no set up required right out of the box. Good range and battery life. Excellent quality clear sound and picture including the night vision. Very easy to operate even without referring to the instruction booklet (for those who don't like to read). Very user friendly. Very reasonably priced for the features and quality. Only unit that has a removable optical zoom lens as well as the digital zoom. They also offer an optional removable wide angle lens. Additional cameras are available, unlike another system I was considering buying until after struggling to try and understand their representatives broken English it became apparent that you couldn't purchase additional cameras (even though their add specifically stated "can add up to 4 cameras"). The only way you could get additional cameras with that company, was to buy additional systems. When I mention that was at the very least deceptive advertising, if not false advertising their representative hung up on me. The additional cameras with this system are absolutely simple to pair up.The system can scan from one camera to the next or just monitor one camera at a time.  As if the features, the quality, and the price isn't enough incentive, their Customer Service is by far above and beyond any company I've ever dealt with before. I can't think of anything at all that I dislike about this monitor system and would highly recommend it to anybody, especially those that are quality conscious and want the best bang for their buck

Reviews.Title: Best monitor!
Reviews.Author: MarthaC
Reviews.Content: We've been using this all the time for a few weeks now and it's been great. Yes, it doesn't connect to wifi but everything else is perfect. Video quality is the best one we've seen so far.

Reviews.Title: Great battery life
Reviews.Author: Nicolas Navas
Reviews.Content: We waited a bit to buy a monitor until  we moved our baby to his room. We live in the UK and bought it when in the US and it is far superior to the ones we could find in the UK. Both units are plastic, but it is far superior to the ones you can get in the market. Battery life and range are superb. I would highly recommend it. For the future hopefully the new versions you can see the transmission in your ipad iPhone etcGreat service from Mae at infant optics as we had some follow up request and questions

Reviews.Title: GREAT monitor system
Reviews.Author: kate.mia
Reviews.Content: This system works wonderfully, and I am most impressed with the range.  The image quality is fabulous as well, and I am also jazzed about the wide angle lens (as I'm a bit of a camera nerd).  Great customer service as well (I am swapping my monitor that beeps when the screen goes off for a new one that doesn't, free of charge).  Highly recommended unit, accessory, and company!

Reviews.Title: Great monitor.
Reviews.Author: Stanislav Spivak
Reviews.Content: The older version of the DXR-8 (prior to 3/2014) had a very bothersome flaw - it would beep very loudly whenever the screen was turned off. The newer models do not have this issue and mine was replaced at no extra charge.The monitor works as advertised. Both day and night vision modes are clear. Remote camera movement is a very very handy feature. The zoom function has limited utility as the resolution in zoom mode is so low it is sometimes difficult to tell if my 4 month old daughter's eyes are open or closed in zoom mode. However zoom is not necessary as the picture in regular mode is very clear.This unit will get occasional interference from wifi devices but this is rare.Otherwise, an excellent purchase and I plan to use it for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bales
Reviews.Content: We had a Motorola at first that everything interfered with. This monitor works so well. My only complaint is that the Menu button is where I naturally put my hand to pick it up but that's not a big deal. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding monitor
Reviews.Author: momofboys
Reviews.Content: There is nothing negative to say here. I bought this monitor to use  in 3 different rooms of our home. We knew we wanted pan & tilt and we needed 3 cameras. Budget was an issue and to us, this was an investment. I did not want to have a wi-fi camera because I am on my phone way too much as it is, the battery would always be dead, and you cant talk on the phone and watch the kids at the same time. We use this in the baby's room, the toddler's room, and a play area in the basement so I can keep an eye on the toddler while making dinner. Other monitors have too many options and the blaring music going through the camera and all the buttons everywhere (lorex) but really all you need is the pan and tilt, the temperature, and the talk back. I use our talk back button almost every time one of them is asleep to let them know I am coming and it is ok. They will stop crying and stare right up at the camera because the sound is so clear. It is not scary. It is also nice when the toddler thinks it is ok to get out of bed and i can catch him and tell him "get back in bed!" without going in his room 1 hundred times. Turning the volume up and down is easy and scanning and tilting the awesome camera is just as simple. The best part is that you can actually SEE the kids and if they are asleep or their eyes are open. Both cameras are quite far from the beds and we have black out curtains in their rooms. ABSOLUTELY NO PROBLEM.  I recently had an issue with my parent monitor and Mae at Infant Optics made the exchange so easy and flawless. I had a new monitor in my hands the next day. You have no idea how amazing a product is until you have to live without it for 24 hours. totally worth the money, the sanity, your time, the customer service, and more importantly the peace of mind of watching your cutie pies sleep and play safely.

Reviews.Title: Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: George Hilios
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor when our baby was about a week old. It's easy to set up and use and the image is fantastic - even in the dark. We were very impressed. Downsides, the battery only lasts 6 hrs and starts beeping to announce it needs to be plugged in. Not usually that big of a deal but I was pretty sleep deprived, not thinking about charging electronics, and when this would wake me up and not the baby... oh boy, not good. I finally learned just to plug it in every time I went to sleep.The talk function is nice - you can talk through the monitor to the baby in her room. My daughter isn't old enough to really be comforted by just my voice but it works great for telling the dog to sop barking in the baby's room!

Reviews.Title: fantastic customer service & wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Liv
Reviews.Content: I've used my monitor for four months, and I love it. They've changed the problematic beeping as of March 2014 so that is no longer an issue. A few weeks ago I tried to plug my charger chord into the monitor screen (apparently a bit too hard) and the connecting piece came loose, fell into the monitor, and it would no longer charge. I called the company, and they returned my phone call within 5 minutes from caller ID (I left no message) to see if they could help me. I told Mae of the problem and she had me send the monitor back. As soon as I had texted the picture of the package at the post office, they sent me a new monitor (which got there the next day) without even waiting to receive the monitor from me. The new monitor works wonderfully, and Mae followed up to make sure everything was satisfactory. I've bought many thousands of dollars worth of products on Amazon in the last year, and this is the best customer service I've received.Now what I like about the camera: The one thing I didn't like (the beeping) is now eliminated with the March 2014 version. I love that I can move the camera when I'm not in the room to adjust the view or to check something like if the baby's blanket is still covering her feet. It also makes it much easier to get a good view from anywhere not just one specific location. I also like the zoom function and the room temperature check function. The chord on the camera is really long so that I can move it all around the room depending on if the baby is in her swing, rocking sleeper, crib, etc., without unhooking something permanently fixed in one location, like over the crib. I can see if it's dark in the room or light without changing anything (although there is a brightness function if you want it). I'm a very satisfied customer and would highly recommend this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Good monitor ... great customer service!
Reviews.Author: J Tran
Reviews.Content: My husband did extensive research on video monitors, and decided we 'needed' to purchase this one based on all of the features previous reviewers have mentioned.  However, just a few weeks after we started using it, the up/down panning function on the camera stopped working (no idea why).  When I got around to calling Infant Optics customer service, I was impressed by the service I received.  A replacement camera was sent out promptly, and I received a personalized follow up email from the customer service rep I had communicated with to make sure everything was working OK with the new camera.  Over the years, I've had to contact customer service for various products, and I have to say that Infant Optics is up there in terms of the quality of their service.  The DXR-8 is definitely not a cheap monitor, so it's reassuring to know that if anything goes wrong with it, the company will support you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality only one flaw
Reviews.Author: Soprlily
Reviews.Content: Like every other reviewer has stated, the beep when the monitor goes into sleep mode is annoying, however the video quality is top notch in both day and night vision. I love the tilt options and the camera has a wide range of movement.  The customer service is phenomenal and when I emailed them about the beep on the monitor, I was informed that the next line coming out will have an option to turn off the beep when it goes into sleep mode.  You can turn the sleep mode completely off and just flip the monitor down so that it doesn't keep you up at night. I love this monitor and am glad that we decided to go with this over the Motorola.

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-8 monitor
Reviews.Author: Ema
Reviews.Content: We got this monitor as a shower gift. We relied on this monitor when we had her in her nursery and it's been great so far. We are planning on a second child in 2-3 years so we'll be getting another camera to add to this monitor. The reception has been good and we haven't had any connection issues with this unit. I would recommend this to our friends and family. Great gift!

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Bradley Ross "bdross1"
Reviews.Content: Purchased a unit a few months ago and unfortunately it developed a glitch and the remote camera stopped communicating with the monitor.  Infant Optics immediately sent a replacement unit and I had the new system in my hands the day after contacting them.  The signal between the units is strong and I can keep an eye on everything even when I am in my stand alone block garage.  The night vision is clear and the intercom works like a champ.  We just could not be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great audio and video
Reviews.Author: Maria Kranz
Reviews.Content: Been reliable for a few weeks now and it works great! Video and sound is very clear. I love how I can talk back to my son when he cries for attention. Can't think of anything negative about this camera!

Reviews.Title: Best monitor out there
Reviews.Author: Laura E. Snyder
Reviews.Content: This monitor is top of the line!1. Excellent customer service - they replaced our monitor quickly and for free to provide us with a unit that does not beep despite buying the monitor a few months earlier2. Excellent, well thought out productA. Great picture day and night - i can see her breathing or the sucking movement on her pacifierB. Very good sound quality - you can hear all of our baby's gurgles and hiccoughs but they don't over register on the volume scale allowing us to ignore her little noises and respond when she really is fussyC. Love the temperature reading on the monitorD. Love the battery lifeE. The signal range is good - better if you keep the monitor away from bluetooth signalsF. The monitor is easy to set up, use and adjust using the buttons on the monitorOverall, I don't believe there is anything comparable on the market. This really is an excellent monitor! We have not used the interchangeable lenses yet but we think those will make the monitor usable beyond our baby's first few years! Love this monitor!

Reviews.Title: A must for new parents!
Reviews.Author: bombercoach11 "bombercoach11"
Reviews.Content: Have used this product for a month.  Great picture with an awesome range of wireless.  This is the best monitor we have found on the market.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: I've loved having this monitor. I can watch my boys and talk to my older one when he's calling me. Like other reviewers I just am not crazy about the loud beep everything the screen goes to sleep. There should be an option to turn that off. Other than that I LOVE this thing and plan to buy a second camera soon to pair with it.

Reviews.Title: Switched from Samsung SEW-3037W to this monitor and WOW is it amazing!
Reviews.Author: Eliana & Mark
Reviews.Content: This monitor completely blows the Samsung-3037W out of the water. Amazing image quality, 50% longer range, not glitchy, would highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: Holly Ambady
Reviews.Content: This is a great monitor even though it's not the most affordable monitor in town. The picture is crystal clear and the scanning mode between our 3 cameras is really nice to have. We have 2 monitors fitted with the wide angle lens and it makes a big difference when you want to see the whole room all at once.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Brian Corsaut
Reviews.Content: The unit works great.  Was really easy to set up.  The picture quality is good, both in colour and in total darkness with the infrared lights.  The range finally died after 837 feet (we measured, and that was going through two walls, one being brick).  Lastly the annoying beep that people are talking about when it goes into sleep mode is only distracting if your the worlds lightest sleeper.  Both my wife and I easily sleep through it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use user interface
Reviews.Author: Andrew Cohn
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use in any lighting conditions. The pan tilt function is good for bigger rooms that have multiple spots you need to monitor. Audio sensitivity is excellent and the range covers our 2-floor house. The zoom on this monitor beats all the monitors since it uses an optical lens piece to zoom the camera sight.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Lynette
Reviews.Content: Clear night vision and wide screen. Would be better if screen can be activated with sound so I can immediately see what is happening

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: klp1986
Reviews.Content: Had a couple problems at first but called the company and they fixed it right away. Didn't have to talk to a machine! :) Customer service was wonderful. Haven't had any issues since. Good clear picture, love the remote pan tilt zoom, and can take the monitor outside while baby is asleep inside. Happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Child's Keeper
Reviews.Author: Eliran Shoushan
Reviews.Content: Read out the specifications of the Product and literally that is what you have in your hand!!Great product , terrific performance from High latency with signal and throughout the VOX sound system.one major thing that would be taking this product 2 or 3 level up is changing the TFT monitor to LCD/LED monitor to get HD results, and make the GUI of it more friendly...

Reviews.Title: Infant Optics DXR-8
Reviews.Author: Joel Jain
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a new baby monitor for our new baby and we used a 2008 summer infant monitor prior to the DXR-8 for our older son. This is a big step up with the lenses feature making it easier to position the camera further away and still be able to see the crib clearly. Once we used the zoom lens we didn't have to switch the lenses at all. Directional control of the panning/tilting feature is quiet and smooth. This is well designed monitor with a good design elements.

Reviews.Title: Good range and signal reception
Reviews.Author: SmartBuyer
Reviews.Content: We live in a 4000' house with thick walls and this unit has no problems receiving signal in all parts of the house including the basement. It's a very solid monitor and we haven't had any issues with this unit.  All in all, a great gift so far and we won't hestitate to get this for friends/family.The wide angle lens is very useful if you want to see the room in one screen without the need panning the camera left and right. We should be using this once our son grows older.

Reviews.Title: All we wanted in a monitor
Reviews.Author: Michael Rice
Reviews.Content: monitor has all the features we wanted. pans across the room with lens presets for different zoom levels. It's very easy to use and we have been very satisfied with this purchase. Night vision video quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Big screen with good functionality
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Flory "Kate"
Reviews.Content: This monitor lives up up to the hype with the new zoom and wide angle feature offered on this model. I use two of cameras to keep on an eye (and ear) on my two children. It comes with a lens cover that is pre-mounted on the cam out of the box. It might look like it's a lens piece from the images, but it's just a metal cap. What I liked about this monitor is the LED sound display on the left side of the monitor unit. Most of the newer monitors have this, and I think this is a really good feature if you have the volume down when you sleep.

Reviews.Title: Our second infant optics monitor
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Eddins
Reviews.Content: I love this monitor so far. We have a DXR-5 older version that was half the price, but we wanted to uprade to a pan and tilt model for our new house. We now use both of the monitors with the DXR-5 as a backup monitor. The customer service was really good when we had the old monitor so we wanted to stick with infant optics. So far we didn't have any problems yet (fingers crossed!) but I am confident with this brand.This new one is a really good camera and monitor with a really handy optical zoom and wide angle feature! All the rest is quite standard for a $200+ monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, used this for a month
Reviews.Author: diamond sans "DMS"
Reviews.Content: We received this as a gift last month and we really love it. I think this product deserves a good review for how user-friendly it is. It's got all the features we need and it covers all around our 3 storey house. The video unfortunately is not HD but it's still very clear in day and night conditions. We haven't had any problems with it so far (even dropping the handset unit a few times from table height onto marble flooring) and it's a tough fella!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Vernetta Prince
Reviews.Content: Very good monitor that works as advertised. We have 2 extra cameras paired up and leave it in SCAN mode cycling through the cams every 10 seconds or so. We've got 2 cams mounted with the wide angle lens and it shows the whole living room and nursery in one screen. Works great! love it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Wesle81 "New daddie"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product that is a worthwhile investment. So far we love this monitor. It's got all the features that we wanted (sound indicator, temperature gauge etc) We had a summer infant but returned it after we found out that it pick up signal at certain parts of the house. This monitor doesn't have any problems so far.

Reviews.Title: A nice baby monitor with alot of features
Reviews.Author: L.mom
Reviews.Content: This baby monitor has most of the things we expected from a $230 monitor. The optical lens gimmick is more useful than I thought it would be, and the pan and tilting mechanism is very smooth and intuitive. We also bought the wide angle lens and tested it out last night... it gives a scenic view of the whole room but we still haven't found much use at this stage. The only problem is at this price, I was expecting a monitor that could be hooked up to the internet knowing it runs on the same 2.4ghz frequency band. We will still keep this but will consider a dropcam that lacks pan and tilt to run in parallel with this system.

Reviews.Title: Not what I hoped for...
Reviews.Author: Kari Anders
Reviews.Content: I was excited about this product and I want it to work for our family but it just isn't. I love the idea of the different lens and being able to see both twins in their cribs and the wide area lens for our toddler. What I'm not excited about is that we are on our second unit and the sound continues to go out for no reason. It will just go off in the middle of the night. We finally figured out you have to unplug the camera and plug it back in to get it to work again, but who wants to worry about that. I agree with the rest of the reviews about the horrible beeping sound it makes. I'm not sure because the range is supposed to be better than our old Summer Infant video monitor but it is far from better. I can't even do yard work without that thing constantly beeping. I will say the customer service has been nice about it and are more then willing to exchange it, but we are on our second one. It's tiring, so I'll be picking a new one.

Reviews.Title: I don't usually write reviews but after trying several baby monitors I had to do it for this spectacular item!
Reviews.Author: Adrian D. Berci
Reviews.Content: I had the angel care system first, then I got the summer baby system for my parents, but they all have poor video quality and don't pan/tilt via remote... this system not only has the best picture quality of the 3 systems, the camera moves smoothly and the whole system works without glitches/errors... also never loses connection... finally this system seems like and feels like the best quality of the 3, from design to execution it is a really nice looking/feeling product... super pleased with this small company that took on the likes of motorola, samsung, angel care, summer, lorex, etc and made a better product at a competitive price!!!! If you are in the market for a high end baby monitor, look no further, don't believe me? order it, and if you aren't blown away from the moment you open the box, send it back because it's amazon and I think baby products allow for free returns within 90 days... but I highly doubt you will want to return it after seeing this thing in person... I can't say enough good things about it, especially after the frustration and disappointment I felt with the other 2 high-end systems...

Reviews.Title: Great for looking after adults too
Reviews.Author: Joseph Billiar
Reviews.Content: I don't use this to monitor babies although this is it's designed for. I use this to monitor my mother who lives in the same house as us. At first we tried a few IP cameras but the software setup and lag drove me nuts. Turning to a conventional monitor like this was a big step forward - better video quality, framerate, lag and all. This model is a more costly option but it's worth the money for the zoom and zoom-out with optical lens you get. The pan/tilt movement is silent and responsive unlike IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Christopher B Odom
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my wife who has been wanting a video monitor for our new baby. We were really pleased with all the features until one morning the camera and monitor became "unsynced". We went through the trouble shooting with no luck. My wife called the company to request a replacement but didn't expect a response because she called on a Sunday. An hour after calling and not leaving a message my wife received a voicemail from the company apologizing for the missed call and how they could help. We called back and that night a replacement monitor was shipped out. We received the new monitor a day later and a follow up email a week later to check on the performance of the new monitor.We believe that the original monitor was defected because our replacement has not had any problems. The video and sound quality are great and there is no static. The background noise is very minimal which is helpful because our daughter sleeps with a sound machine.I would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great monitor!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Carroll
Reviews.Content: I love how sharp the night vision is on this unit. The optical zoom makes the video very clear to look up close at our daughter at night. We've used other monitors that had zoom but it's digital (like zooming in on a smartphone) and deteriorates the video quality. The lens on this makes a big difference.The handheld unit has a nice big screen with a keypad to control the direction of the camera.Overall great monitor!

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Ronni Pitman
Reviews.Content: Cool item, doesn't work. It continuously drops signal for no reason (we do not have any more/less walls & doors than the average home & we are well within the claimed 700' range. Not to mention when it loses the signal, the beep is ridiculously loud (understandably to get parents' attention, but it truly could wake the dead). Contacted customer service who gave tips on how to fix it, but none of it worked. Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Terribly Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Ryder
Reviews.Content: I felt compelled to write a review after owning this monitor for only two weeks.  First, the range is terrible.  It constantly keeps warning me that I am out of range, this is bizarre to me, as I live in a smaller home and am usually no more then a room away or directly below the nursery.  For 230$, this monitor should have much better range than that.  Secondly, today the monitor completely froze on an image of my baby and the sound went completely out.  The only way out of this was to power it down and power it back up.  Granted, powering it down fixed the issue, but the fact that there was this type of an issue in the first place, within 2 weeks of owning this item, is the reason I'm in the process of sending this item back.  The only reason this item got 2 stars from me is simply because the image (when working) is really clear, I liked that it warned me when the battery was dying, the talk back feature was nice, and I also like that it is relatively quiet.I had higher hopes for this item based on the good reviews, but the one I received is not worth the price of this product.
